thread.title: Benton P.
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Benton P.

author: Benton P.
title: Benton P.
text: You cannot go wrong with BH Photo for photography supplies. I recently ordered a new telescope (ETX1250) from them. Arrived in excellent shape, earlier than expected. I have also ordered several cameras from them, both used and new. They are just excellent to deal with. You cannot go wrong with BH Photo!!!
